meta.job_title: Raw Material Manager/Sr. Manager, Quality Control

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage raw materials strategy and procedures
Harmonize Raw Material programs across CMOs
Participate in Raw Material Risk Assessments as subject matter expert
Assess impact of new global regions on Raw Material requirements
Partner with Supply Chain, QA, and Manufacturing on vendor selection and qualification
Interface with QA to manage supplier issues and participate in vendor audits
Author, review, and/or approve SOPs, policies, risk assessments, and technical reports
Interface with cross-functions teams service as SME for Raw Materials
Support of cGMP operations, including technical review of change control documentation and reports, deviations, OOS and other manufacturing and laboratory investigations
Work with project lead to address delays and escalate when necessary
Assist in the preparation of CMC regulatory submissions
Support other QC activities and projects as needed

education_certification.credential: BS or MS in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Biology, or other related field
